title: Remote Communication Simulation Training for Interprofessional Healthcare Teams

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and workflow processes
context.additional_context: A modular microlearning structure for working professionals in a smartphone-based learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can perform accurate information-delivery procedures using phone/email in various medical scenarios.
Learners can execute interprofessional collaboration protocols with 80% accuracy using video conferencing tools.
Learners can derive at least three communication improvement points through reflective journals after simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
